title: Hand-Cut Printer's Scrap Christy Mathewson Portrait SGC A For Sale

posts.post_title: Hand-Cut Printer's Scrap Christy Mathewson Portrait SGC A For Sale
posts.post_content:
Price includes shipping and insurance and assumes a no-fee payment method.  Paypal goods is fine but add 3%.

I've had this for a long while and decided to test the waters on it since this card has been pretty hot lately.  All four edges are wavy, and as you can see, it has huge borders.

$1500
